name: Main Switchboards
WSA20-MPX-04000-EL-ITC-31032000 - Construction Tests (Pre-energisation)
Physical Checks
1. Confirm boards dimensions are in accordance with approved shop drawings (provide drawings reference in the Comments section)
2. Confirm correct MSB Form of Separation, Provide actual Form of Separation in Comments section
3. Confirm the Layout of fitted components (ACBs, MCCBs, MEN, ATS) is in accordance with approved shop drawings (provide drawings reference in the Comments section)
4. Confirm that Brand of fitted components is in accordance with approved shop drawings (provide drawings reference in the Comments section)
5. Confirm meters location, types and labels are in accordance with approved shop drawings
6. Confirm the circuit breakers rating is in accordance with discrimination study (provide discrimination study reference in the Comments section)
7. Confirm Trip units and protection relay settings are set in accordance with discrimination study
8. Confirm correct circuit identification and labelling
9. Confirm easy access to controls termination
10. Confirm correct location, access and sufficient support for incoming cables
11. Confirm correct location, access and sufficient support for outgoing cables
12. Confirm the board busbars and cables are tighten as per manufacturer recommendations and standards. Provide applied torque in a Comment section
13. Confirm correct phase identification of busbars and cables inside the board
14. Confirm correct size of incoming power cables as per approved cable schedule
15. Confirm correct size of earthing conductors
16. Confirm no visual damage to the equipment or meters. Mark the observed issues in a Comment section (if any)
Checked By (Heyday):
